name: Docebo
description: h Docebo’s multi-product learning suite, enterprises around the world are equipped to tackle any learning challenge and create a successful learning culture within their organization.
features: The AI-powered LMS built for enterprise: Our flagship learning management system delivers sharp design, even sharper functionality, and the flexibility to scale for any team or use case.
Create content in minutes with the power of AI. Content can make or break your learning programs. Let Shape’s AI do the heavy lifting.

Grow your business with content. Docebo Content aggregates best-in-class courses, book summaries, audio lessons and more from 150+ publishers with global reach. With new content added monthly, our library grows with your business.
Measure the effectiveness of learning. Go beyond the numbers to understand the impact of your training.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Docebo is redefining the way enterprises leverage technology to create and manage content, deliver training, and understand the business impact of their learning experiences.
ShortDescription: The Docebo Learning Platform. Driven by innovation, powered by AI.

Highlights.name: Technology and innovation
Highlights.description: Docebo has always been on the forefront of new technologies because technology can make learning simpler and more effective. We were the first in our industry to embrace machine learning and generative AI, because every learner should be able to create and experience high-quality, relevant, and personalized learning content.

Highlights.name: Built for the business of learning
Highlights.description: Docebo is focused on helping enterprises deliver scalable, hyper-personalized learning to all their audiences. And we believe learning should have a measurable business impact—by growing revenue, reducing costs, mitigating risk, and engaging learners.

enhanced_description: Docebo offers a multi-product, AI-powered learning platform designed for enterprises. It enables organizations to create, manage, and deliver training content, as well as measure the business impact of their learning experiences. Leveraging machine learning and generative AI, Docebo aims to simplify content creation, enhance personalization, and provide a scalable learning solution. The platform focuses on accelerating skill development, growing revenue, reducing costs, mitigating risk, and engaging learners to build a successful learning culture.
key_use_cases: Understand the business impact of learning experiences
competitive_advantages: Pioneering adoption of machine learning and generative AI in the industry
Delivers scalable and hyper-personalized learning experiences
Focus on measurable business impact (revenue growth, cost reduction, risk mitigation, learner engagement)
Provides flexibility to scale for any team or use case
Aggregates best-in-class content from 150+ publishers with global reach
roi_benefits: Ability to understand the business impact of learning
scalability_features: Flexibility to scale for any team or use case
Designed to deliver scalable, hyper-personalized learning to all audiences
